suite.name: Verify Invalid Credential Tests

kw.name: Launch Browser
kw.doc: This will launch browser and set implicit wait Example | Launch Browser |

kw.name: Append To Environment Variable
kw.doc: Appends given ``values`` to environment variable ``name``.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'gc' to base url 'None'.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening url 'https://demo.openemr.io/b/openemr/index.php'

kw.name: Enter Username
kw.doc: This keyword will send username Examples: | Enter Username | admin | | Enter Username | accountant |

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'admin123' into text field 'id=authUser'.

kw.name: Enter Password
kw.doc: This keyword will send password Examples: | Enter Password | pass | | Enter Password | accountant |

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing password into text field 'id=clearPass'.
Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Select Language
kw.doc: This keyword will select dropdown using the text/label Examples: | Select Language | Dutch | | Select Language | Danish |

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name=languageChoice' by label Dutch.

kw.name: Click Login
kw.doc: This keyword use to click login button Examples: | Click Login |

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[@type='submit']'.

kw.name: Validate Invalid Error Message
kw.doc: This keyword will return the invalid credential error message Examples: | Validate Invalid Error Message | | Validate Invalid Error Message |

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//div[contains(text(),'Invalid')]' contains text 'Invalid username or password'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: This suite will handle all the test case related to the invalid credentails - OEM - 102
